## Using this plugin

- [Excalidraw](https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw) is a whiteboard tool that lets you sketch diagrams and drawings.
- This plugin adds a button to the bottom of your RevalJS slides that opens a local version of the Excalidraw canvas.
- Click the ðŸŽ¨ (Artist Palette Emoji) button button to open Excalidraw.

## Keyboard shortcut

- Alternatively, you can click the ` (backtick) button on your keyboard to toggle the Excalidraw editor.
- See the [README.md](README.md) file to learn more.
